description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Work description : Take care docs. of import shipments
              
              - Submit e-manifest to customs
              
              - Issue arrival notice & delivery order to customers
              
              - Etc
              

              ** Details will be discussed in the interview
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1. Job requirement : New Graduate will be welcomed (Experienced Staff is preferred)
              
              * Must
              
              - Graduate college - up
              
              - Have good communication and linguistics skill with foreign customers / agents and boss in English or Japanese
              
              (Reading, Writing, Listening, Speaking)
              

              * Better
              
              - Have knowdelge or experience of forwarding activities
              

              2. Benefits:
              
              - Private Insurance & other benefits according to Vietnamese Labor Law
              
              - Annual Salary review
              
              - 13th month salary
              
              - Japanese N2 grade up will have encouraging bonus every month
              
              - School support program
              
              - The year-end party
              
              - Company trip every year
              
              - Bonus two times per year depending on company business result
              

              3. CV requirement
              
              - CV in English
              
              - Other related documents
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Japanese N2 grade up/ Chinese will have encouraging the bonus every month
               







                Private  Insurance & other benefits according to Vietnamese Labor Law
               







                Bonus two times per year depends upon the company business  result
